column5: Hi All,  I was wondering what advantages a shimano calcutta B 200 series reel has over a shimano curado 200's or abu garcia revo's? Line capacity and drag isn't all that different.  Thanks in advance for responses
Gear ratio and braking systems...here's some links to information....  Shimano Calcutta B  ShimanoÂ® Curado  Abu Garcia Revo

I have both a Calcutta (I always thought that was a dumb name for a reel) and a Curado, I prefer the Curado to my more expensive Calcutta, I've even abused the Curado for muskie fishing with heavy line and heavy baits and it's still my fav.
